venue.address_1: off Fort Hill & Beal Street - The entrance across from the West Hingham Commuter Rail Stop
venue.name: Bare Cove

item.description: This is a really nice 4 mile walk.  The dogs have a blast here and the footing is good since they do plow it regularly.
item.why: I have tried walking/hiking some of the places where I usually lead a hike and the footing is really tough. I figure I will stick with Bare Cove for the time being since they plow there.
item.name: Bare Cove
